sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.PRTCD ,CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(T1.YRMT,1,4),'-'),SUBSTR(T1.YRMT,-2,2)) YRMT , MIN(T2.PRT_KOR_NM) AS PRT_KOR_NM , TO_CHAR(MAX(T1.UPDT_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') MAXUPDT , COUNT(*) CNT FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON ( T1.PRTCD=T2.PRT_AT_CODE ) GROUP BY T1.PRTCD, T1.YRMT HAVING 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.YRMT = CONCAT(#grStartYr#, #grStartMn#)
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT T1.PRTCD , T1.YRMT , TO_CHAR(MAX(T1.UPDT_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') MAXUPDT , COUNT(*) CNT FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 GROUP BY T1.PRTCD, T1.YRMT HAVING 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.YRMT = CONCAT(#grStartYr#, #grStartMn#)
)

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.PRTCD , T1.ENTRPSCD ,CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(T1.YRMT,1,4),'-'),SUBSTR(T1.YRMT,-2,2)) YRMT , T1.CHRGEKNDCD , T1.COSTVAL , T4.PRT_KOR_NM , T2.FIRM_KOR_NM , T3.FEE_TP_KOR_NM FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRTCD=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRTCD=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD=T3.FEE_TP) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.YRMT >= CONCAT(#eGrStartYr#, #eGrStartMn#)
AND T1.YRMT <= CONCAT(#eGrEndYr#, #eGrEndMn#)
AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRTCD=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRTCD=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD=T3.FEE_TP) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.YRMT >= CONCAT(#eGrStartYr#, #eGrStartMn#)
AND T1.YRMT <= CONCAT(#eGrEndYr#, #eGrEndMn#)
AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.COSTVAL),0), '999,999,999,999')) AS SUM_COSTVAL ,TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*), '999,999,999,999')) AS DP_TOT_CNT FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRTCD=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRTCD=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD=T3.FEE_TP) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.YRMT >= CONCAT(#eGrStartYr#, #eGrStartMn#)
AND T1.YRMT <= CONCAT(#eGrEndYr#, #eGrEndMn#)
AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.PRTCD ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(T1.YRMT,1,4),'-'),SUBSTR(T1.YRMT,-2,2)) YRMT ,T1.CHRGEKNDCD ,T1.COSTVAL ,T4.PRT_KOR_NM ,T2.FIRM_KOR_NM ,T3.FEE_TP_KOR_NM FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRTCD=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRTCD=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD=T3.FEE_TP) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD IN (SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE CSTMR_TP IN ('11','12','43'))
AND T1.YRMT >= CONCAT(#sEgrStartYr#, #sEgrStartMn#)
AND T1.YRMT <= CONCAT(#sEgrEndYr#, #sEgrEndMn#)
AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRTCD=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRTCD=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD=T3.FEE_TP) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD IN (SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE CSTMR_TP IN ('11','12','43'))
AND T1.YRMT >= CONCAT(#sEgrStartYr#, #sEgrStartMn#)
AND T1.YRMT <= CONCAT(#sEgrEndYr#, #sEgrEndMn#)
AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T1.COSTVAL),0), '999,999,999,999')) AS SUM_COSTVAL ,TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*), '999,999,999,999')) AS DP_TOT_CNT FROM PORT_MIS_COSTVAL_STATS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR T4 ON (T1.PRTCD=T4.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRTCD=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD=T3.FEE_TP) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.AGENT_CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.PRTCD = #prtAtCode#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD IN (SELECT AGENT_CODE FROM P2MGR.SHP_OWOP_F@YGPA_P2MGR WHERE CSTMR_TP IN ('11','12','43'))
AND T1.YRMT >= CONCAT(#sEgrStartYr#, #sEgrStartMn#)
AND T1.YRMT <= CONCAT(#sEgrEndYr#, #sEgrEndMn#)
AND T1.CHRGEKNDCD = #chrgeKndCd#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
